items.name: Methane plume detections in the Permian Basin
items.description: Additional data related to the paper "Satellite-based Survey of Extreme Methane Emissions in the Permian Basin", Irakulis-Loitxate et al. (2021). The archive provides all methane plumes detected in the Permian Basin during the survey with Gaofen5, ZY1 and PRISMA satellites in NetCDF4-CF format. Additional information about .nc files is provided in the READ_ME file.
items.citationHtml: Irakulis-Loitxate, Itziar; Guanter, Luis, 2021, "Methane plume detections in the Permian Basin", https://doi.org/10.7910/DVN/K8SN73, Harvard Dataverse, V1
